title: AI Assistive Technology Bridges the Gap Between Sighted and Visually Impaired
description: Incorporating OpenAI’s GPT-4, assistive technology services are revolutionizing how blind individuals experience the world, providing them with enhanced visual details and newfound independence. By utilizing artificial intelligence, these advancements aim to bridge the gap between the sighted and visually impaired communities, enabling blind individuals to connect with others through facial cues and expressions.
